Title: Authorizes state reimbursement to municipal corporations for tax revenue lost and expenses incurred as a result of the reduced assessment of forest land
Summary: Authorizes a procedure whereby the chief executive officer of a municipal corporation in which there is located privately owned forest lands which are exempt from real property taxes to make application to the state for reimbursement for revenues lost as a result of such exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the assessment of private forest lands and to provide state assistance to municipal corporations relating thereto
